page.title: 17Unemployment
page.content:
Of the 220 children that left Waltheof School in 1984, 19 left to get a job, 118 joined the Youth Training Scheme, 56 registered unemployed. (8.9% went into permenent jobs- average for the City.) (Manor Mercury, December 1984)
Unemployed Manor youngsters who meet at the Manor Community Centre have decided to form a football team which will be part of new Unemployed League. (Manor Mercury, June 1984)
Redundant? Short Time? Unemployed? Feeding the family on a low budget? Try our Mercury Specials and see the difference to your purse. (Manor Mercury, July 1984)
